column1: Even with that was really hard
column2: i had to drop lokarr set about lv 60
column3: because i was taking too much damage. But if you don't have all that i used to level up
column4: i'll explain a short guide about how to do it in the normal way.

column1: Go into oathkeeper giving 1 point of everything you wanna use to kill mobs until you can get eye of reckoning. That should be about lv 15-20. On lv 10 you can go into shaman and get the mogdrogen pact
column2: spend a couple points here. Try to put points on the EoR just to see you kill fast enough with it and try to complete the oeathkeepe skill bar to get divine mandate. Get points on jugdment
column3: vire might and ascension as helping skills
column4: presense of virtue and mogdrogen pact try to max it (energy regeneration to get infinite EoR) then you can max the EoR. Before the main skill
column5: max the Soulfire. You can put some points on the guardian of Empyrion and his Secondary for more debuff)

column1: At this point your build is Fire physical.
